long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple toggle device switch between Desktop and Mobile (375x812). This is only for switching between Desktop and Mobile View, and I created to use in my daily practices and company, where opening "devtools" could provide more information than my team needs.
